description:
exp/types/staging: index and slice type checks

Also: handle assignments to the blank identifier.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

I am assuming the semantics match or will be made to match the compiler. I know there are some spec CLs pending that I haven't read yet.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6665bbc48b3b ***

exp/types/staging: index and slice type checks

Also: handle assignments to the blank identifier.
